info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Allen, northeastern Adams, western Paulding and northwestern Van Wert Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 114 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Monroeville, or near Decatur, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Convoy around 125 PM EDT. Payne around 130 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Paulding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
